title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported JAR in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported JAR file for the second time.
OB: Performing an export of a directory (project) and placing the exported JAR in the same directory (project), then overwriting the exported JAR file a second time.
EB: The out of sync message should not be displayed when overwriting the exported JAR file in the described scenario.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue causing the out of sync message to be displayed when the exported JAR file is overwritten.
